history.proof: intros d. qsimpl time: 1 use: mlrec_ind,True.

exceptions.tactic: apply mlrec_ind with (P0 := fun _ _ _ => True) (P1 := fun _ _ _ => True).
exceptions.exn: In environment d : preDTA The term "fun (_ : preDTA) (_ : state) (_ : term) => True" has type "preDTA -> state -> term -> Prop" while it is expected to have type "forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> Prop" (cannot unify "Prop" and "state_reconnait x x0 x1 -> Prop").

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall d : preDTA, predta_kill_non_coacc_rec_def_2 d prec_empty tnil (rec_empty d)

Premises:
Inductive term : Set := app : ad -> term_list -> term with term_list : Set := tnil : term_list | tcons : term -> term_list -> term_list
rec_empty : forall d : preDTA, liste_reconnait d prec_empty tnil
Inductive prec_list : Set := prec_cons : ad -> prec_list -> prec_list -> prec_list | prec_empty : prec_list
preDTA = Map state : Set
predta_kill_non_coacc_rec_def_2 : forall (p : preDTA) (pl : prec_list) (lt : term_list), liste_reconnait p pl lt -> Prop
semantic_equiv_1_2 : forall d : preDTA, pre_reconnait d prec_empty tnil (rec_empty d)
semantic_equiv_0_1 = fun (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (n : nat) (H : rec_list_terms d p tnil n = true) => let H0 : p = prec_empty := semantic_equiv_0_0 d p n H in (fun H1 : p = prec_empty => eq_ind_r (fun p0 : prec_list => liste_reconnait d p0 tnil) (rec_empty d) H1) H0 : sem_equiv_prop_l tnil
preDTA_ref_ok_def : forall d : preDTA, preDTA_ref_ok d < -> (forall (a : ad) (s : state), MapGet state d a = Some s -> state_ref_ok s d)
sem_listes_2 : forall (d : preDTA) (pl : prec_list), liste_reconnait d pl tnil -> pl = prec_empty
invar_2_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (n : nat), rec_list_terms d p tnil n = true -> p = prec_empty
semantic_equiv_0_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (n : nat), rec_list_terms d p tnil n = true -> p = prec_empty
predta_coacc_fix_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad), lower_fix_point bool (ensemble_base state d) (lemd d) (predta_coacc d a) (predta_coacc_states d a)
predta_kill_non_coacc_rec_1 : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list) (e : MapGet prec_list s c = Some l) (l0 : liste_reconnait d l tl), predta_kill_non_coacc_rec_def_2 d l tl l0 -> predta_kill_non_coacc_rec_def_1 d s (app c tl) (rec_st d s c tl l e l0)
preDTA_ref_ok_distinct_dest : forall d0 d1 d : preDTA, preDTA_ref_ok_distinct (M2 state d0 d1) d -> preDTA_ref_ok_distinct d0 d /\ preDTA_ref_ok_distinct d1 d
predta_coacc_increasing : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad), increasing_app bool (lemd d) (predta_coacc d a)
essence_list = fun (l : term_list) (d : preDTA) (pl : prec_list) => match l with | tnil => 1 | tcons _ _ => match pl with | prec_cons _ _ _ => taille_0 pl + S (term_high_0 l) * S (DTA_taille d) | prec_empty => 1 end end : term_list -> preDTA -> prec_list -> nat
invar_0 = fun n : nat => nat_ind (fun n0 : nat => forall (m : nat) (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list), rec_list_terms d p tnil n0 = true -> n0 <= m -> rec_list_terms d p tnil m = true) (fun (m : nat) (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) => prec_list_ind (fun p0 : prec_list => rec_list_terms d p0 tnil 0 = true -> 0 <= m -> rec_list_terms d p0 tnil m = true) (fun (a : ad) (p0 : prec_list) (_ : rec_list_terms d p0 tnil 0 = true -> 0 <= m -> rec_list_terms d p0 tnil m = true) (p1 : prec_list) (_ : rec_list_terms d p1 tnil 0 = true -> 0 <= m -> rec_list_terms d p1 tnil m = true) (H1 : rec_list_terms d (prec_cons a p...
prec_list_ref_ok_check = fix prec_list_ref_ok_check (p : prec_list) (d : preDTA) {struct p} : bool := match p with | prec_cons a la ls => addr_in_dta_check d a && (prec_list_ref_ok_check la d && prec_list_ref_ok_check ls d) | prec_empty => true end : prec_list -> preDTA -> bool
conservation_1 : forall (d : preDTA) (l : term_list), 1 <= essence_list l d prec_empty
Inductive reconnaissance : preDTA -> ad -> term -> Prop := rec_dta : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait d ladj t -> reconnaissance d a t with state_reconnait : preDTA -> state -> term -> Prop := rec_st : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> liste_reconnait d l tl -> state_reconnait d s (app c tl) with liste_reconnait : preDTA -> prec_list -> term_list ->...-> liste_reconnait d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)
mlrec_ind : forall (P : forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> Prop) (P0 : forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> Prop) (P1 : forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> Prop), (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state) (e : MapGet state d a = Some ladj) (s : state_reconnait d ladj t), P0 d ladj t s -> P d a t (rec_dta d a t ladj e s)) ->...-> forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list) (l : liste_reconnait p p0 t), P1 p p0 t l
mreconnaissance_ind : forall (P : forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> Prop) (P0 : forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> Prop) (P1 : forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> Prop), (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state) (e : MapGet state d a = Some ladj) (s : state_reconnait d ladj t), P0 d ladj t s -> P d a t (rec_dta d a t ladj e s)) ->...-> forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (r : reconnaissance p a t), P p a t r
mstrec_ind : forall (P : forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> Prop) (P0 : forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> Prop) (P1 : forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> Prop), (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state) (e : MapGet state d a = Some ladj) (s : state_reconnait d ladj t), P0 d ladj t s -> P d a t (rec_dta d a t ladj e s)) ->...-> forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term) (s0 : state_reconnait p s t), P0 p s t s0
sem_listes_1 : forall (d : preDTA) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), ~ liste_reconnait d prec_empty (tcons hd tl)
conservation_2 : forall (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list), 1 <= essence_list tnil d p
conservation_5 : forall (d : preDTA) (hd : term) (tl : term_list) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), S (essence hd d) <= essence_list (tcons hd tl) d (prec_cons a la ls)
liste_reconnait_ind : forall P : preDTA -> prec_list -> term_list -> Prop, (forall d : preDTA, P d prec_empty tnil) -> (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), reconnaissance d a hd -> liste_reconnait d la tl -> P d la tl -> P d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)) -> (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), liste_reconnait d ls (tcons hd tl) -> P d ls (tcons hd tl) -> P d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)) -> forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> P p p0 t
sem_listes_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), liste_reconnait d p (tcons hd tl) -> p <> prec_empty
predta_coacc_fix_1 : forall (d : preDTA) (a a0 : ad) (n : nat), MapGet bool (power (Map bool) (predta_coacc d a) (map_mini state d) n) a0 = Some true -> MapGet bool (predta_coacc_states d a) a0 = Some true
prec_list_ind : forall P : prec_list -> Prop, (forall (a : ad) (p : prec_list), P p -> forall p0 : prec_list, P p0 -> P (prec_cons a p p0)) -> P prec_empty -> forall p : prec_list, P p

```coq
intros d.
apply mlrec_ind with 
  (P0 := fun _ _ _ => True)
  (P1 := fun _ _ _ => True).
- intros d a t ladj e s. auto.
- intros d s c tl l e l0. auto.
- intros d p0 t l. apply semantic_equiv_1_2.
Qed.

original: intros d. apply mlrec_ind with (P0 := fun _ _ _ => True) (P1 := fun _ _ _ => True). - intros d a t ladj e s. auto. - intros d s c tl l e l0. auto. - intros d p0 t l. apply semantic_equiv_1_2.
